sections.name: Items
content: To define an item, the item definition must be defined in the behavior pack in a JSON file.
All attributes, including item names, must be defined using item components.

sections.name: Item Components
content: Below are the various components for item functionality.

rows.Name: minecraft:armor
Description: The armor item component determines the amount of protection you have in your armor item.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: How much protection does the armor item have.
Texture Type to apply for the armor. Note that Horse armor is restricted to leather, iron, gold, or diamond.

rows.Name: minecraft:block_placer
Description: Planter item component. planter items are items that can be planted.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: block:  Set the placement block name for the planter item.
List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

rows.Name: minecraft:chargeable
Description: Allows an item to be used over a duration.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.
Event trigger for when the item has completed its use duration.

rows.Name: minecraft:cooldown
Description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item it becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: The type of cool down for this item.
The duration of time this item will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

rows.Name: minecraft:digger
Description: Digger item. Component put on items that dig.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Trigger for when you dig a block that isn't listed in destroy_speeds
Use efficiency? Default is set to false.

rows.Name: minecraft:display_name
Description: Display Name item component. Display Names set the name to display when an item is in use or hovered over.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: The display name for an item.

rows.Name: minecraft:durability
Description: A property that determines when an item will break from use. The durability of an item is potentially depleted upon use based on the damage chance.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Damage chance is the percentage chance of this item losing durability. Default is set to 100. Defined as an int range with min and max value.
Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking.

rows.Name: minecraft:dye_powder
Description: Dye powder, there are 16 kinds of dye.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Defines what color the dye is.

rows.Name: minecraft:entity_placer
Description: Entity placer item component. You can specifiy allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.
The entity to be placed in the world.
List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

rows.Name: minecraft:food
Description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry). Default is set to false.
The value that is added to the actor's nutrition when the item is used. Default is set to 0.
Event trigger for when the item is consumed.
Saturation Modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when applying the saturation buff. Default is set to 0.6.
When used, converts to the item specified by the string in this field. Default does not convert item.

rows.Name: minecraft:fuel
Description: Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: How long in seconds will this fuel cook items for.

rows.Name: minecraft:icon
Description: The icon item component determines the icon to represent the item.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Legacy texture string id for older item icons. Legacy ID list can be found here under 'Namespaced ID': https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Bedrock_Edition_data_values
The key for the object contain the expected textures, from file 'resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json'.

rows.Name: minecraft:item_storage
Description: The Storage Item Component is used for storing Items within an Item's User Data
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features or

content: The max capacity of the item, default is 64

rows.Name: minecraft:knockback_resistance
Description: Knockback Resistance Item. Component put on items that provide knockback resistance.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Amount of knockback resistance provided with the total maximum protection being 1.0

rows.Name: minecraft:on_use
Description: The on_use item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Event trigger for when the item is used.

rows.Name: minecraft:on_use_on
Description: The on_use_on item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used on a block in the world.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Event trigger for when the item is used.

rows.Name: minecraft:projectile
Description: Projectile item component. projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: How long you must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.
The entity to be fired as a projectile.

rows.Name: minecraft:record
Description: Record Item Component.  Used by record items to play music.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 13.
Duration of sound event in seconds, float value.
Sound event type: 13, cat, blocks, chirp, far, mall, mellohi, stal, strad, ward, 11, wait, pigstep, otherside, 5.

rows.Name: minecraft:render_offsets
Description: Render offsets component: optional values can be given to offset the way the item is rendered.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

rows.Name: minecraft:repairable
Description: Repairable item component: how much damage can this item repair, what items can repair it.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Event that is called when this item has been repaired.

rows.Name: minecraft:shooter
Description: Shooter Item Component.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.
Launch power scale. Default is set to 1.0.
Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.
Launch power. Default is set to 1.0.
Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

rows.Name: minecraft:throwable
Description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.
The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.
The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.
The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.
The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.
Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

rows.Name: minecraft:weapon
Description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block
Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob
Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage

rows.Name: minecraft:wearable
Description: Wearable item component.
Experimental toggles required: Holiday Creator Features

content: equipment_slot: slot.weapon.mainhand, slot.weapon.offhand, slot.armor.head, slot.armor.chest, slot.armor.legs, slot.armor.feet, slot.hotbar, slot.inventory, slot.enderchest, slot.saddle, slot.armor, slot.chest, slot.equippable

sections.name: Item Definition Properties
content: The properties are part of the Item Definition. This helps the system determine how to parse and initialize this item.

sections.name: format_version
content: Specifies the version of the game this entity was made in. If the version is lower than the current version, any changes made to the entity in the vanilla version will be applied to it.

rows.Name: category
rows.Description: The category for this item. Categories are used to control high level properties of how the item is integrated into the bedrock engine, such as whether it can be used in slash commands.

rows.Name: identifier
rows.Description: The identifier for this item. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla item.

rows.Name: is_experimental
rows.Description: If this item is experimental, it will only be registered if the world is marked as experimental.
